description:
Tax Code and Regulations - TouchTax Mobile App (Tax Deskbook App) provides easy and affordable access on your HP TouchPad to all 7,700+ sections of the latest edition of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the Code), the Treasury Regulations in Title 26 of the Code of Federal Regulations (the Regulations) and the Internal Revenue Bulletins since 2003. The application’s  goal is to replace your physical copies of the Code, Regulations and IRBs (Rev. Rul., Rev. Proc., T.D., Temporary Regulations, etc.) with electronic versions that are always up-to-date. 

The Code and Regulations incorporated into TouchTax are full version electronic adaptations of the official law published by the Office of the Law Revision Counsel of the United States House of Representatives, the Treasury Department and the U.S. Government Printing Office. TouchTax contains the latest publications of the Preliminary USC Internal Revenue Code (current through July 17, 2013) and official Regulations (current through November 2013). 

TouchTax is expected to be updated as soon as new versions of the Code and Regulations are made available. Internal Revenue Bulletins are updated approximately weekly and appear automatically on your device (as soon as it's connected to the Internet). The next official version of the Code and Regulations is expected to be available in June 2014 (that's when the federal government publishes the updated versions). 

TouchTax includes:

* Access to all 7,700+ sections of the Code and Regulations
* Crosslinks between Code and Regulations
* Keyword search of Code, Regulations and Internal Revenue Bulletins
* Bookbrowse feature
* Table of contents and easy chapter, subchapter, etc. browsing
* Increase and reduce font size
* Email sections
* Take notes
* Open Code, Regulations or Internal Revenue Bulletins as PDF version
* Bookmark Code and Regulation sections
* Fullscreen view
versionNote: New features include: (a) Enyo 2 interface; (b) all features currently available on other tablet operating system platforms; (c) updated table of contents browsing for the Code and Regulations; (d) updated Internal Revenue Code through July 17, 2013; (e) updated Treasury Regulations through April 1, 2013 (which is the latest available version as of November 9, 2013); (f) faster section loading; (g) fixed some overlapping sections.
